2.7.name: wordpress/livejournal-crossposter-remix-rus-stable-version
2.7.description: Automatically copies all the messages posted on your blog in Live Journal as well as resource-based using LiveJournal Server. The text is placed between the tags [nocrosspost] text [/ nocrosspost] will not be republished. Fixed a bug with the disappearance of the panel visual editor.
